parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sudden Loss of Power and Engine Shutdown
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of power and engine shutdown can cause the vehicle to stall or shut down while in motion, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly loses power
the engine shuts down
the "Stop safely Vehicle will shut off soon" or "Service Charging System" error message appears
the vehicle applies heavy brakes automatically
the speed drops suddenly
the engine light is on
the vehicle is unable to accelerate
the brake pedal is stuck
the wipers start automatically
and the keyfob is not detected.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or shut down, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
the transmission fails to respond
the accelerator pedal is depressed but the vehicle fails to accelerate
the transmission is stuck in park
and the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden shut-off of the engine while driving can cause loss of power, steering, and brakes, leading to a high risk of accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle displays a warning message "Stop Safely
Vehicle Will Shut Off Soon" or "Car Shutting down in [X] secs"
followed by a sudden loss of engine power
loss of steering
and loss of brakes
leaving the driver with no control over the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the auto start/stop feature can cause the engine to fail to restart when the brake is released, leaving the vehicle stranded in an active traffic lane or intersection, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The engine fails to restart when the brake is released
the vehicle remains stopped in an active traffic lane or intersection
a chime and display message guide the driver to shift to park and manually restart the car.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective engine component can cause the engine light to come on, indicating a potential problem, and may lead to engine shut-off while driving, posing a risk to safety.
symptoms: The engine light and "A" warning light stay on while driving
indicating a potential problem
and may cause the engine to shut off while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Stop Safely - Vehicle Will Shut Off Soon Warning
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden shutdown of the vehicle can cause accidents, especially in high-traffic areas, and compromise the safety of the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The vehicle displays a "Stop Safely - Vehicle Will Shut Off Soon" warning
followed by the engine shutting off and refusing to restart.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the auto/start-stop system can cause the vehicle to shut down unexpectedly, leading to safety risks and inconvenience.
symptoms: The vehicle shuts down and refuses to restart
requiring the driver to shift to park
turn off
remove their foot from the brake
and wait 1-5 minutes to restart.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical Issues Causing Air Conditioner Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical issues can cause the air conditioner to fail, leading to discomfort and inconvenience for the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The air conditioner stops working
and the dealership finds electrical issues
including low Freon levels and faulty fuse arrays.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle stalling can cause accidents, especially at low speeds, and compromise the safety of the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls while driving
losing all power
and requiring the driver to restart the vehicle.
